Text: Yeah, what's up with the 2 screens? The audio and visual looked awesome except for that part.
WHAT THE FUCK THE SCREEN IS SPLITTED IN 2?!? ASSHOLE TORRENT!!
Stupid people can't read? 3D you morons.

Too funny!  The split screen is because this torrent is a 3D movie.  You must have a 3D TV and 3D glasses to view this movie.  Then it isn't "2 screens" any more - it's one screen in 3D.  Now you know!  If you don't have a 3D TV and 3D glasses, then don't download 3D movies!  It's that simple.
